CustomField.formula: IF( MONTH( Advance__r.Target_Advance_Date__c ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( Advance__r.Target_Advance_Date__c ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( Advance__r.Target_Advance_Date__c ), MONTH ( Advance__r.Target_Advance_Date__c ) + 1, 1 ) - 1 ) - Advance__r.Target_Advance_Date__c + 1
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days between the Wire Date and the last day of the Month
CustomField.label: Days Between Wire and Last Day of Month
